body.name: DIFY 4-Tier Bookshelf, Wood Display Storage Shelves 54.5" Tall Bookcase Open Bookshelf for Home Office, Living Room and Bedroom, Grey
features: 【Eco-friendly Board】Manufactured from high-quality engineered wood, no special care needed, scratch-, and water-resistant
【Adjustable Shelf】Perfectly sized 4-tier bookcase with 2 adjustable shelves and 2 fixed shelves for maximum functionality and various storage needs in any room, also serves as a display shelf
【Wall Mount】Shelf bookcase can be mounted on the wall for child safety
【Product Dimension】L31.1” x W11” x H54.5", 25lbs weight capacity per adjustable shelf, 30lbs per fixed shelf
【Easy Assembly】Bookcase comes with step-by-step instructions and labeled parts for quick installation. 1-year warranty, any quality problems, feel free to contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DIFY 4-Tier Bookcase Whether you are looking to decorate your living room or study area, the bookcase from DIFY will help you create a stylish space. The open bookcase designed with multiple shelves for maximum functionality and various storage needs in any room, also serves as a display shelf. Come with adjustable shelves to help you easily adjust the shelf height.

4 Colors Available This bookshelf is available in 4 colors. You can choose according to your needs to fit your space. Manufactured from high-quality engineered wood, it needs no special care, scratch-, and water-resistant. Shelf bookcase also can be mounted on the wall for child safety.

Product Details Spacious Bookshelf Top The spacious shelf top can be used for some extremely high items. Large Storage Space Provide ample storage space for books, CDs, magazines, and collections. BackPlane Come with the backplane to prevent the shelf from wobbling or separating apart. Sturdy Base The sturdy thickened base offers extra stability to avoid wobbly.

What's the material the bookcase made of? The bookshelf is manufactured from high-quality engineered wood, no special care needed, scratch-, and water-resistant. What's the weight capacity of the bookshelf? 25lbs weight capacity per adjustable shelf, 30lbs per fixed shelf. Is this bookshelf easy to assemble? The bookshelf comes with step-by-step instructions and labeled parts for quick installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice bookshelf!
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is very nice... it is solid, sturdy, and high quality! The finish on it is attractive and it looks great! I got it for my daughter's room... with five shelves plus the top it is a wonderful storage solution not only for her books but for her toys too. The assembly was easy for the most part however the back of the bookshelf is made up of three panels that are attached using plastic strips... when trying to put these panels in place it is somewhat difficult because one of them keeps trying to pop out when placing another one in. Once together it is truly amazing and well worth the effort. I also like how it can be mounted to the wall to keep it from tipping over.I am very pleased with this bookshelf... it really pulls my daughter's room together and creates so much extra space for her. It's a good value for the money and I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf exceeded my expectations! It is very sturdy and holds a lot of things. The assembly was nice and easy because all the parts were labeled, however it did take about 2 hours. I love that 2 of the shelves can be adjusted to fit different sizes of things. I have put this bookshelf in my small home office. I have put books, picture frames, and baskets to organize things on this bookshelf. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and fits with my other bookshelves
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase took me a little over an hour to assemble because I was doing it by myself, but it came together pretty easily with the instructions. The color matches my other bookcases really well, which I'm happy with. It feels sturdy and well balanced, and the shelves went in smoothly - it's always a great thing when nothing has to be forced to fit. Now I can transfer some of my book piles into this and get my library slightly more organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product was is super easy to assemble and install the materials and instructions that came with were easy to handle and follow this after product was completely assembled. It seems dirty and durable. I love it and not to mention huge space for storage and other things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds many books
reviews.reviewText: I got tired of moving 50 boxes of books around and donated nearly all of them to a local library. I don't have enough books now to half fill this bookcase. My sister still collects books and has room for another bookshelf so I am giving it to her for Christmas. The two adjustable shelves will allow her to have a couple of shelves for her taller books. She will love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice! Provides great storage space!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have a home office that is constantly in need of space and organization. This shelf has been very helpful for us. It was relatively easy for the two of us to assemble it. It is sturdy and tall. The back is thin, but works just fine for what we want. It looks great and fits what we needed perfectly. There’s a lot less clutter on our desks and floors now that we have this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to assemble and not too sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Like the title says difficult to assemble and not terribly sturdy. Purchased this to go into the kids room and hold their books, my mistake for not measuring accurately for it to fit in said space. my bad! But the assembly itself took over two hours, closer to three, for what should have been a simple bookcase. its flimsy and made of pressboard so the back is easy to break and the sides will crumble if not moved delicately. I am just not impressed with the overall quality of this piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice bookshelf. Easy to assemble. Nice and sturdy.
